items.description: Technologies: React, Redux, Docker, Docker Compose, Node.js, Elasticsearch, Stripe, Auth0, Mocha
Constructed an extensive library of reusable components to minimize development overhead
Found the best possible solutions to difficult problems by learning advanced use-cases for libraries like React and Redux
Used docker, docker-compose, and node.js to create mock implementations of third-part dependencies
Presented detailed overviews of the system architecture during knowledge transfer meetings
Technologies: Backbone, Marionette, Mustache, Mocha, Objective-C
Exceeded expectations by learning fast and taking on a larger work-load than expected
Enrolled in online iOS classes to better facilitate my transition into the project
Translated user stories and high-level design specifications into robust implementations
Co-opted with fellow employees to keep responsibilities while under-staffed
Technologies: React, Redux, Vagrant, Virtualbox, Cassandra, Django, Mocha
Used React and Redux to construct a responsive user experience
Automated common startup procedures and configurations with virtualbox and vagrant
Integrated with an existing Django API by reading code first-hand
Contributed to regular code reviews and approved pull requests from fellow teammates
Technologies: ASP.net, Visual Basic, Entity Framework, MySQL
Incentivized code-reuse by creating stateless service classes for factoring out common logic
Discussed possible solutions with teammates to ensure application quality
Designed custom data models by translating supplied paper forms into SQL schemas
Integrated with hardware drivers to create custom ID-card printer and scanner services
